## Container.batchRegister() method

Batch register components

**Signature:**

```typescript
batchRegister(components: {
        target: Function;
        identifier?: string;
        options?: ObjectDefinitionOptions;
    }[], batchOptions?: {
        preProcessDependencies?: boolean;
        warmupAOP?: boolean;
    }): void;
```

The components to register


</td></tr>

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The batch options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Example


```ts
container.batchRegister([UserService, UserRepository], { preProcessDependencies: true, warmupAOP: true });
```
